Subject: My name is MEGATRON
Message-ID: <9chklj+69qe@...>

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: gestalt_menasor@...

Megatron steps up inside the cockpit, and looks around. It has been 
such a long time since fuel and smoke filled his sensory receptors. He 
stood for a few seconds to enjoy it. He then stepped out of Cyclonus 
and walked towards the Hill Motormaster had positioned himself at. 
"Excellent Motormaster" Megatron commended him. As soon as Motormaster 
noticed Megatron there he stood to attention and saluted him. He then 
elbowed Dead-End, who was nearest, to do the same. "Stand down" he 
told them. He walked up to the peak of the hill, and scanned the 
battle field for Shockwave.
